attributes.description: We're creating a new social media app (native and web) to make it easier for anyone to show off their talent and succeed in life. If you're interested hit me up @ kevin@vuid.co (don't judge our website, it's slow and intentionally stealthy right now - but we think you'll like the app - or maybe not).
attributes.name: New_social_media_app_to_make_it_easier_for_people_to_succeed
